what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Diabetic Neuropathy ?,The NINDS conducts and supports research on diabetic neuropathy to increase understanding of the disorder and find ways to prevent and cure it. New medications are currently being examined to assess improvement or stabilization of neuropathic symptoms.,NINDS,Diabetic Neuropathy
